parameters.name: BaseOsTag
parameters.description: The image tag of the operating system. The tag is used only for management nodes.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID.

*   If you specify a value for this parameter, all community images in the region where the cluster resides are queried.
*   If you do not specify a value for this parameter, the community images that are supported by all clusters are queried.

parameters.name: ImageOwnerAlias
parameters.description:
The image source. Valid values:

*   self: custom image
*   others: shared image

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description: The instance type of the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance. If you do not specify the instance type, the community images that are supported by all instance types are queried.
